    • movePiece

      public String movePiece(int initX, int initY, int newX, int newY)
      Moves the piece and returns the move signature
      Parameters:
      initX - the initial x position of the piece to be moved
      initY - the initial y position of the piece to be moved
      newX - the x position for the piece to be moved to
      newY - the y position for the piece to be moved to
      Returns:
      either "-1"-illegal move, "0"-normal move, "1"-kill

    • coordsToId

      private int coordsToId(int x, int y)
      Returns the index of a piece given its coords
      Parameters:
      x - position on x axis
      y - position on y axis
      Returns:
      index of the piece if not found return -1

      Returns:

    • checkManMove

      private String checkManMove(Color color, int initX, int initY, int newX, int newY)
      Checks if man move is legal the move signature
      Parameters:
      color - color of the piece to be checked
      initX - initial x position of the piece
      initY - initial y position of the piece
      newX - x position for the piece to be moved to
      newY - x position for the piece to be moved to
      Returns:
      either "-1"-illegal move, "0"-normal move, "1"-kill

    • checkKingMove

      private String checkKingMove(Color color, int initX, int initY, int newX, int newY)
      Checks if King move is legal the move signature
      Parameters:
      color - color of the piece to be checked
      initX - initial x position of the piece
      initY - initial y position of the piece
      newX - x position for the piece to be moved to
      newY - x position for the piece to be moved to
      Returns:
      either "-1"-illegal move, "0"-normal move, "1"-kill

    • checkForWin

      private String checkForWin()
      Checks for the winning condition
      Returns:
      either "0" - no one wins, "w1" - white wins, "w2" - red wins

      Checks if move is in bounds
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate
      y - x coordinate
      Returns:
      true if in bounds else false
